lead_paragraph: The Oklahoma City Thunder, helped when Dallas sat out its usual starters, beat the visiting Mavericks, 108-89, on Wednesday night.
snippet: The Oklahoma City Thunder, helped when Dallas sat out its usual starters, beat the visiting Mavericks, 108-89, on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Mavericks’ Starters Sit Out, and Thunder Reap Rewards
headline.print_headline: Mavericks’ Starters Sit Out, and Thunder Reap Rewards

abstract: NBA Roundup; Oklahoma City Thunder defeats Dallas Mavericks, 108-89; other basketball scores noted.
